title: Adoptable pets at Baltimore-area shelters

organizations.name: tigger courtesy of baltimore humane society  meet tigger

text:
Adoptable pets at Baltimore-area shelters Oreo Courtesy of Baltimore Humane Society 
Oreo is a fun-loving and playful dog in need of a forever home. Energetic, happy and lovable are just a few words to describe her. She loves long walks, belly rubs and running around in the yard. She also enjoys playing with toys that squeak and being with people who don't mind getting kisses. In her previous home Oreo lived with kids, cats and Tigger. They are a bonded pair planning to be adopted together. 410-833-8848, bmorehumane.org. 
Oreo is a fun-loving and playful dog in need of a forever home. Energetic, happy and lovable are just a few words to describe her. She loves long walks, belly rubs and running around in the yard. She also enjoys playing with toys that squeak and being with people who don't mind getting kisses. In her previous home Oreo lived with kids, cats and Tigger. They are a bonded pair planning to be adopted together. 410-833-8848, bmorehumane.org. (Courtesy of Baltimore Humane Society) Tigger Courtesy of Baltimore Humane Society 
Meet Tigger, a social and happy dog looking for a forever home. He’s active, energetic and a fast runner. Tigger likes to stand up on you to give you hugs. He knows some commands like sit, paw and down. Tennis balls, ropes and stuffed animals are some of his favorite things. Tigger’s most favorite thing, though, is Oreo. They are a bonded pair planning to be adopted together. You’ll get double the love. 410-833-8848, bmorehumane.org.
